name: Georgia
description:
Set in a dystopic future US of A (that still has tapes??), the game takes place on the road within a moving vehicle going cross country. Georgia’s job is to get rid of some fishy stuff the government doesn’t want people to see by dumping it into a designated ‘void’—the radio and the government’s motivational tapes for truckers hint at some of the ways that daily life in this universe is different from the present day.

CREDITS:

Jam Graham - Team Leader

Tobias Do - Programming

Socks Whitmore - Writer/Acting

Savva Gretzky - Concept Art

Blake Derkson - Asset Art

BK Dawson - Acting

Ryan Yoshikami - Sound/Music

PRODUCERS:

Vincent De La Torre, Marley Townsend, Roy Berardo, Theo Vaillant

You can listen to the soundtrack from this game and other CalArts Game Makers titles here!
